div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1185 Rhodes, 1880 Burial: c. 450 B.C. (M) Contents: 41+ AR Dicaea: 1 didr. Thasos: 8 didr. Lete: 3 didr. Mende: 1 tetradr. Neapolis: 1 didr. Stagira: 1 tetradr.; 2 didr. Unc. Thraco-Maced: 3 didr. Aegina: 2 didr. Tenos: 1 didr. Thera?: 1 didr. Phocaea: 1 tetradr. Ialysus: 1 fr. Lycia: 3 st. Phaselis: 1 double-siglos Soli: 1 double-siglos Cyrene: 3 tetradr., 3 dr. Barce: 1 dr. Barce and Teuchira: 1 tetradr. Euesperides: 2 dr. Disposition: Brussels 40 Naster, Lucien de Hirsch (Brussels, 1959), p. 148, no. 887
